query:
SELECT id, businessName, 
  CASE WHEN instagramGrowth IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_instagram,
  CASE WHEN leadGenSystem IS NOT NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_leadgen,
  SUBSTRING(instagramGrowth, 1, 100) as instagram_preview
FROM roadmaps 
ORDER BY createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 3;
